required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Effect of Liposome Vitamin C on the Absorption and Metabolism of the Human Body.
clinical_study.official_title: The Effect of Liposome Vitamin C on the Absorption

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the difference between vitamin C in the form of oral liposomes and general vitamin C in a fixed period of time in plasma and urine.

detailed_description.textblock: we recruited 11 healthy subjects and adopted a cross-over test. the subjects need to take 3 tests during trail. After each test was completed, a washout period of 14 days was required before the next test start. The subjects were informed to consume one sachet vitamin C without liposome, liposomal process A vitamin C, or liposomal process B vitamin C (Double Nutri™) every test, and vitamin C concentration was measured at baseline (0 hours), 0.5, 1, 2, 3, 4, and 8 hours after taking test sample.

primary_outcome.time_frame: at 8 hours after taking test sample
primary_outcome.description: vitamin c was assessed by Ascorbic Acid Colorimetric Assay Kit II

primary_outcome.time_frame: at 8 hours after taking test sample
primary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of Triglyceride

primary_outcome.measure: The change of body mass index (BMI)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Time 0, 0.5, 1, 2, 3, 4, and 8 hours after taking test sample
primary_outcome.description: BMI is a measurement of a person's leanness or corpulence based on their height and weight, and is intended to quantify tissue mass.The body mass index (BMI, kg/m^2) and body mass (kg) were assessed by InBody770.

primary_outcome.time_frame: at 8 hours after taking test sample
primary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of aspartate aminotransferase

primary_outcome.time_frame: at 8 hours after taking test sample
primary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of alanine aminotransferase

primary_outcome.time_frame: at 8 hours after taking test sample
primary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of creatine

arm_group.arm_group_label: liposomal process B vitamin C (Double Nutri™)
arm_group.description: liposomal process B vitamin C (Double Nutri™)

subjects need to take 3 tests during trail. After each test was completed, a washout period of 14 days was required before the next test start

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Adults between 20-60 years old,
2. No heart, liver, kidney, endocrine and major organic diseases
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Renal insufficiency and dialysis
2. Cancer
3. Underweight (BMI≦17) or obese (BMI≧27),
4. Take chronic disease drugs,
5. Blood pressure systolic blood pressure ≧130 mmHg or diastolic blood pressure ≧85 mmHg,
6. Too high fasting blood glucose ≧ 100 mg/dL,
7. Triglyceride ≧ 150 mg/dL,Total cholesterol ≧ 200 mg/dL,
8. Have a history of vitamin C allergy,
9. People with mental illness,
10. Pregnant or breastfeeding women,
11. Hematosis,
12. Kidney stones,
13. Long-term vitamin C supplements (at least 200 mg per day for more than one month)

facility.name: Research & Design Center, TCI CO., Ltd
